title: Looking for a similar typeface?
content:
I'm looking for something structurally similar to this - but not Gotham, Trade Gothic extended - really like the squatness of this sample. Idlewild from Hoefler is quite similar but the G is not quite right....

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021213330im_/http:/typophile.com/files/67a26123e2ea379bfa9f18cb7a498985_3730.jpg)

any help appreciated!
author: pbags

comments.content: maybe we could see the G you are looking for.
I may have some suggestions but to perform the search accurately, I'd need a bit more information. That's why I totally agree with Jodie, some information on the /G would be very helpful.
